# H&L Cleaning Co. — Full Site Documentation

> H&L Cleaning Co. is a residential home cleaning service in Central Arkansas offering weekly and one-time cleaning with a fully customizable pricing builder. Owned and operated by Christina, the business focuses on personalized, thoughtful cleaning that makes homes restful and comfortable.

## Business Overview

H&L Cleaning Co. provides professional residential cleaning services in Central Arkansas. The company philosophy centers on the idea that "a clean home is a restful home." Christina personally handles consultations and cleaning, ensuring a consistent, trustworthy experience. The business serves homes of all sizes with transparent, upfront pricing.

## Website Structure

The website is a single-page application (plus legal pages) built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — no frameworks or build tools. It features:

- A fixed navigation bar with mobile hamburger menu
- A hero section with botanical SVG decorations
- An interactive 3-step pricing builder
- A "How It Works" process section (4 steps)
- A deep clean rotation explainer
- A policy/expectations section
- A contact section with email
- A consultation booking modal with form submission via Formspree
- An interactive "dirty window" canvas overlay that cleans as users build their package
- Floating botanical SVG decorations throughout

- **Weekly**: Recurring service at standard pricing
- **One-Time**: Single visit with a $50 surcharge

## Deep Clean Rotation

The deep clean rotation is a $25/week add-on that adds one deep-focus area to every weekly visit on a 4-week cycle:

- **Week 1 — Baseboards**: Every baseboard wiped and refreshed throughout the home
- **Week 2 — Blinds, Vents & Cobwebs**: Reachable blinds and vents dusted, cobwebs cleared
- **Week 3 — Doors & Frames**: Door surfaces and frames wiped clean of dust and marks
- **Week 4 — Handles & Switch Plates**: Every handle and switch plate sanitized throughout home

The cycle then repeats, keeping the entire home consistently elevated.

## Consultation Process

1. **Browse Services**: Explore base cleaning packages and optional add-ons
2. **Build Your Package**: Use the pricing builder to select exactly what the home needs
3. **Book a Consultation**: Schedule a walkthrough to finalize the perfect plan
4. **Enjoy Your Home**: Relax in a clean, restful space

Consultations are booked via a modal form that captures name, email, phone number, and optional notes. Form submissions go to ChristinaFancy6@gmail.com via Formspree. Christina calls within 24 hours to schedule a walkthrough.

## Policies
